parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description: The primary instance ID. You can call the DescribeDBInstances operation to query the primary instance ID.

parameters.name: ReadInstanceId
parameters.description: The read-only instance ID. You can call the DescribeDBInstances operation to query the read-only instance ID.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID. You can call the DescribeRegions operation to query the most recent region list.
